Posts.Content: i I’m so pleased I looked at the groups today. I recently started Exemestane and was losing the will to persevere. I feel so fragile and burst into violent sobs at the smallest thing. I start radiotherapy in 2 weeks so will stop taking the inhibitor for 3 weeks but will definitely then ask my Oncologist to prescribe something else. It certainly helps to know you are in this with me…
Posts.Title: Aromatase Inhibitors - All Brands of The 4 Hormonal Therapy Table...
